title: More old beer label related type
content:
Hi,

I've already established a modern typeface that is equivalent to the script used for Cincinnati Cream, but can anyone identify the other typefaces on the label?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823220621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cincinnati_cream_label_slanted_3777.png)
author: bfingeroth
